title:
What is the status of getting a movie theater in the Monkey Junction area? At least two sites in this quickly growing area have been proposed, but no action has been forthcoming.

Also, what is the status of the Hilton Garden Inn being built in Carolina Beach next to the Boardwalk?  The construction site has been fenced for a couple of years with a sign stating that the hotel is coming, but no activity is evident.
